constructor.details: Build insurance contract after linking it to the bike contract, and deploy the reward token.

emergencySwitch().return: alarmOn A boolean that blocks function execution if true.

getClaimTokenRatio().details: Allow external user (or test script) to know the claimTokenRatio

getPendingPremia(address).details: View the Premium that is owed to Insurer
getPendingPremia(address).return: pendingPremia The premia that are still due for the rides.

getPremiumRate().details: Allow external user (or test script) to know the premium rate
getPremiumRate().return: rate The applicable rate (at underwriting and for pay-as-you-drive payments)

insuredClientsCount().details: Allow for external user (or test script) to count the clients

isInsured(address).details: Allow for external user (or test script) to check if a client is insured
isInsured(address).return: isIndeed Boolean for a client's insured status

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

regularizePayments().details: The "main" function that allows customers to pay their premia, update their claims count, get their paybacks and receive their rewards
regularizePayments().return: success The function successfully regularized all payments

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

tokenClaimReducer(uint256).details: Function allowing the insurance client to redeem a few tokens against a reduction in claims history

params.nbTokens: The number of tokens the client wants to redeem

tokenClaimReducer(uint256).return: success The function successfully burnt the redeemed tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

underwriteInsurance().details: Underwrite (=deliver an insurance contract) to a client
underwriteInsurance().return: success The client should be insured

viewInsuranceStatus(address).details: Get the data history that insurer has on a client
viewInsuranceStatus(address).return: insuredListPointer The rank in terms of subscription of a clienttotalPremiumPaid The total premium received by the insurer from the clienttotalRides The total count of rides done by usergrossClaims The history of claimsnetClaims The claims count according to which the premium is calculatedgrossTokens The history of received tokensnbTokensOwned The tokens effectively owned by the usernbPaybacks The paybackts count for a userpaybackAmount How much did I pay in payback to this user

devdoc.title: Insurance contract for the Bike Shop.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
